user.title: New Threshold Sensor
user.description:
Configure when the threshold mode and when the sensor should turn on and off.

Threshold mode "lower" - The sensor turns on when the input sensor's value is less than the lower limit.
Threshold mode "upper" - the sensor turns on when the input sensor's value is greater than the upper limit.
Threshold mode "range" - the sensor turns on when the input sensor's value is in the range [lower limit .. upper limit].
